ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 754
ygData.msgSnippet: While I agree that Disenchanting Melody is useless I have used two of the other songs you mentioned recently: MMM I use this regularly to help the group get
ygData.messageBody:
While I agree that Disenchanting Melody is useless I have used two of the
other songs you mentioned recently:

MMM I use this regularly to help the group get away from single large mobs
(like giants and griffons) either when a fight goes bad or when we are
suprised (outside only of course). For instance last week I was in a group
that teleported into the druid gate in North Karana. Unfortunately there was
a giant right by the gate and he attacked us. Because I have a fast
connection I regained control first and used MMM to get a bit of space
between us and the giant - we all survived.
Its also handy in duelling if you get blinded, by a paladin for instance.

I also used identify last week to find out which part of the rune of one eye
I had for my lambent armour quests. Its the only time I have used this song
though.

I would like to see identify replaced but MMM is far from useless IMHO, at
least while there is still stuff to fight outside. I have never used the
psalm series in anger and would like to see these made more useful.

Bruen Bladesong
Bard of the 30th song
Erollisi Marr
----- Original Message -----
Message: 5
Date: Fri, 18 Feb 2000 09:01:08 -0500
From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>
Subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?

Can't say that I have ever groupped with anybody that said...

"...my god kerouac - thank god your here... please play that see invis song
please"
or
"...wow, never knew bards could sing a so I could see invis - cool"

Don't most casters get see invis WAY before lvl 24? And most humans have
found a way to deal with the night vision by lvl 24, unless there is a
recent death involved... That's what I mean when I say useless...

There is no doubt alot of our songs are specialized, like the psalm series
and such... but, there are about 6 uselss - they are TOO specialized.

MMM, Disenchanting, Identify jump right to mind, am I to toss the lvl 24
song into that same heap now? Can they be used, yes... are they useful - I
have not found them useful.

I just think that if Verant is gonna limit our songs to 50, and then not
really implement 50... that there shouldn't be that many lemons...

Kerouac Dharmabum
lvl 34
Rodcent Nife
